product_name: CetaphilGentle Makeup Removing Wipes, Fragrance and Alcohol Free
summary: SummaryCetaphil Gentle Makeup Removing Face Wipes are clinically proven to gently remove stubborn waterproof and long-wear makeup from all over the face including the sensitive eye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsUltra soft cloths gentle enough for the most sensitive skinFlexible plastic closure ensures cloths remain moist, making them convenient for travel, the gym or in the carDermatologist tested and clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skinDefends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity including dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.Ophthalmologist TestedHypoallergenicWon't clog poresKey IngredientsContains aloe vera, chamomile and green tea botanicals to soothe and condition skinFormulated WithoutParabenFragranceAlcoholItem 2605919How To UseStart your skin care routine with Gentle Makeup Removing Face Wipes to remove all types of makeup, including long-wear and waterproof makeup. Lift the lid to remove a makeup wipe and gently wipe your face and neck, including around the eye area. Make sure you close the lid securely after each use to keep Cetaphil wipes moist.IngredientsWater, Isohexadecane, Dicaprylyl Ether, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Hexylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Matricaria Flower Extract (Chamomile), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Centaurea Cyanus Flower Extract, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Laurate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylene Brassylate, Citric Acid, Propylene Glycol.
how_to_use: Start your skin care routine with Gentle Makeup Removing Face Wipes to remove all types of makeup, including long-wear and waterproof makeup. Lift the lid to remove a makeup wipe and gently wipe your face and neck, including around the eye area. Make sure you close the lid securely after each use to keep Cetaphil wipes moist.

reviews.headline: Clean and Non Allergic
reviews.comments: Takes your makeup off and gets your face clean

reviews.headline: Great for removing makeup on sensitive skin.
reviews.comments: Love this product for removing makeup from my face. Product does not cause face breakouts.

reviews.headline: I would buy again!
reviews.comments: When i'm taking off my mascara it doesn't irritate my eyes like the Neutrogena ones do! Love these!

reviews.headline: Holy grail wipes
reviews.comments: These wipes get stubborn makeup off without drying out the skin or leaving any residue.  The wipes are just big enough and moist enough to get heavy eye makeup and foundation off. Would recommend

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Excellent product really work and doesn't leave residuo

reviews.headline: I have been using these wipes for years.
reviews.comments: Best makeup wipes for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Very nice.
reviews.comments: I tried this for the first time and love it.

reviews.headline: Extremely disappointed
reviews.comments: The neutrogina wipes (totally butchered the name) made my eyes burn a little, so i tried this out since cetaphil has a good reputation and wow, although it does the job, I literally cannot use them because of how bad it burns my eyes. I guess i will be going back to miscellar water. I would return this if possible but not sure if it is since ive already used a few wipes, trying to give this a chance, but i dont plan on using these anymore.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product get all your makeup off and leaves your face feeling clean and fresh

reviews.headline: 1/2 the price at the place that rhymes with Gramazon
reviews.comments: Buy this for 1/2 the price at the place that rhymes with Gramazon. Love it

reviews.headline: Prob not a repurchase
reviews.comments: Wanted to try a new wipe, coming from using a diff product. It removes all my makeup well, but it makes my eyes burn. Not entirely sure why, as if I'm removing eye makeup up that probably shouldn't happen. Also confused at why only 25 wipes in a package? But that's not Ulta's fault.

reviews.headline: Could be better
reviews.comments: Thought this would be a nice product for sensitive skin because it's Cetaphil, but it actually burned my skin, especially around my eyes when taking off eye makeup.

reviews.headline: Pretty much destroyed my face
reviews.comments: At first, I loved these wipes.  They are larger in size than a lot I've used, had no smell, and did a decemt job taking makeup off.  About half way through them, they started drying out and then they pretty much stopped being able to remove a lot of makeup.  But that's not the worst thing.  I used these for about 3 months.  Over the course of those 3 months, my face started turning really red (like I had rosacea), it got super dry (way more than normal).  I don't really get zits, but they started randomly popping up.  My pores got HUGE and my cheeks actually looked kind of puffy.  I honestly thought something was really wrong with me and I needed to see a dermatologist.  They were the only new product I introduced into my routine.  I stopped using them and 3 days later, there was so much less redness and dryness you have no idea.  I don't know if it's the citric acid that's in these things (why they'd put that in a sensitive skin brand I don't know) or some other ingredient, whatever is in these things destroyed my face and now I'm slowly getting better.  Seriously, just don't buy these if you have dry sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Really nice and I think its helping with my acne ever since I used these wipes my break outs are not as bad as before I used the wipes !

reviews.headline: Best wipes ever
reviews.comments: These are the best wipes for removing make up and leave your skin sooooo soft and smooth.  I want to buy them for all of my friends.

reviews.headline: This will be my new standard makeup remover/cleanser cloth.
reviews.comments: super great at removing makeup and still leaves skin soft, hydrated and feeling clean.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: This product is great for my sensitive, acne-prone skin and is gentle without causing any irritation, I have purchased this product multiple times!

reviews.headline: burn
reviews.comments: i decided to buy these makeup wipes since it's brand i use for a facial cleanser, but they make my face burn horribly. i don't really know why, but they do

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Soft wipes and they don't irritate my skin

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I am a huge fan of Cetaphil but these wipes were lacking. When using to remove my eye makeup, my eyes began burning horribly. I checked the packaging to make sure I bought the sensitive skin kind and that it was safe to use for eye makeup removal - yes to both. Also causes a slight burn to my skin. Definitely won't be buying these again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I got this a month ago, wanted to change my makeup remover was using another brand didn't like the oils left on my face. This doesn't leave any oils, very gentle and feels like I just washed my face. Will be my go to now on
